0:
Hey everyone, I'm Walter! I'm deeply immersed in the world of cryptocurrencies and MEV (Miner Extractable Value) bots. I greet each day with excitement as I delve into the complexities of blockchain technology and decentralized finance (DeFi).

My passion lies in exploring MEV bots, which are powerful tools leveraging transaction sequencing and block inclusion on Ethereum. These bots are essential for optimizing profit by capitalizing on transaction order.

I'm on a mission to understand how MEV impacts decentralized systems. Through my journey, I aim to contribute valuable insights to the evolving DeFi landscape.

Join me as we navigate this fascinating world of crypto together!
